# placeholderString

**Instance Property**

The cell’s plain text placeholder string.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var placeholderString: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If this property returns `nil`, you can also call `placeholderAttributedString` to see if the cell has an attributed placeholder string. Note that invoking this method clears out any attributed string set by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFormCell/placeholderAttributedString] property.

## Asking About Placeholder Values

- **placeholderAttributedString**: The cell’s attributed placeholder string.
